alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; Laramie Valley; North Laramie Range; Snowy Range; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 12:55PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Albany, west central Goshen, western Laramie, Platte and south central Converse Counties through 145 PM MDT... At 1252 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers and isolated thunderstorm along a line extending from near Curtis Gulch Campground to 7 miles southeast of Garrett to near Boswell Creek Campground. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and cause impacts to lightweight and high profile vehicles. Locations impacted include... Laramie, Wheatland, Albany, Guernsey, Chugwater, Bosler, Chugcreek, Esterbrook, Federal, Lakeview North, Sibley Peak, Bordeaux, Tie Siding, Woods Landing-Jelm, Pumpkin Vine, Friend Park Campground, Vedauwoo Campground, North Crow Campground, Iron Mountain and Granite Springs Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; Laramie Valley; North Laramie Range; Snowy Range; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
